result.title: Report on the legal aspects of data governance and interoperability I
result.description: It will provide a legal evaluation of 1 the conditions in which the federation can support innovative data governance organisational settings and 2 the legal requirements related to interoperability and standardisation This deliverable will be aligned as much as possible with the EU legislative agenda specially the Data Act expected in 2021 Q3 in order to ensure coherence between the deliverables key performance indicators and the long term objectives of the federation

result.title: DECIDO policy agenda and recommendations on data analytics and cloud infrastructure adoption in policy making
result.description: This deliverable sets the foundation for a Policy Agenda for big data and cloud at EU level. It depicts a roadmap for the implementation and transferability of big data and cloud pilots in other contexts, complemented with a set of actionable policy recommendations for fostering the development and implementation of big data and cloud in the member states.

result.title: MOVE21 reflective monitoring guide
result.description: This deliverable sets out the framework methodology and protocol for exdurante monitoring of the Living Labs Activities in the Living Labs are monitored in order to assess their processes impacts and implementations This deliverable will be used to create a continuous loop of observations reflections and actions to improve the operation of the Living Labs and the deployment of the innovations The monitoring guide will describe how the different processes for policy coherence for increasing innovation capacity and for developing the innovation cocreation partnerships are monitored It relates to tasks 61 and 62 in WP6
